scripts.open:android: bun run android:reverse && capacitor open android
scripts.build: bun run copy-web && bun run sync
scripts.run:android: bun run android:reverse && capacitor run android
scripts.dev:android: bun run --cwd ../web build && bun run copy-web && bun run sync:android && bun run run:android
scripts.dev:ios: bun run --cwd ../web build && bun run copy-web && bun run sync:ios && bun run run:ios
scripts.android:reverse: ~/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools/adb devices | grep -v 'List' | grep 'device' | cut -f1 | xargs -I {} ~/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools/adb -s {} reverse tcp:3000 tcp:3000
